pull.title: Skip RAII event tests if libevent is built without event_set_mem_functions
pull.body:
Fixes #9493 

I couldn't find a sane way to just mark the tests for skipping. :(

events.message: Skip RAII event tests if libevent is built without event_set_mem_functions

events.body:
utACK 95f97f4
(well, half-tested - I tested that the test is still executed when the functionality is available, I can't test the other case but I'm sure @luke-jr did)
